metadata.Title: CVE-2020-16117 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: In GNOME evolution-data-server before 3.35.91, a malicious server can crashthe mail client with a NULL pointer dereference by sending an invalid(e.g., minimal) CAPABILITY line on a connection attempt. This is related toimapx_free_capability and imapx_connect_to_server.

criterions.comment: evolution-data-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
